mapper.select: select to_char(r.pay_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as pay_time, to_char(r.reservation_st, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reservation_st, r.reservation_num, u.user_name, u.user_tel, p.pet_name from tb_reservation r, tb_user u, tb_petservice p where r.reservation_num = p.reservation_num and u.user_id = r.user_id and u.user_id = #{user_id} order by r.pay_time desc

select count(p.reservation_num) from tb_reservation r left join (select user_id, user_name, user_tel from tb_user) u on u.user_id = r.user_id left join (select reservation_num, pet_name from tb_petservice) p on r.reservation_num = p.reservation_num where r.user_id = #{user_id}
and ${colName} like '%'|| #{searchWord} ||'%'
